sub_title: Senior Education Officer at Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands in China
summary: Enthusiastic and inquisitive professional with strong analytical capabilities, leveraging the skills and approaches acquired during seven years of work experience in China. Passionate about Chinese language, literature, science fiction, translation and political philosophy.
